channel.title: Account Reset Problem
channel.description: Hey..i have problem when i log in server and log out.and i restart server and my character will reset.how to remove reset?so when i log in i still have my lvl?

item.title: Account Reset Problem
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

Oh i don’t know 508s lol.

item.title: Account Reset Problem

item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

[quote=“warlock 999, post:6, topic:267027”]it doesn’t look like your not new to java. Its obv its not saving the game. so you will need to make save using the void. You should know how to do this.[/quote]im using summon 508 source. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,341608.0.html

item.title: Account Reset Problem
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

[quote=“warlock 999, post:4, topic:267027”]go to your master command and and put savegame() in it.[/quote]noo i mean. when i add item or i type master then i log out and restart server.when i log in my character get reset.it remove my friend list item and skill

Read full topic

item.title: Account Reset Problem
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

go to your master command and and put savegame() in it.

Read full topic

item.title: Account Reset Problem
item.dc:creator: @drask182 drask182
item.description:
@drask182 wrote:

[quote=“Surfr, post:2, topic:267027”]Check it’s writing your character info to your character files before you log out, check your run.bat to see any errors, without this people can’t really help you.[/quote]when i log in server i type::master i have 99 skills then i log out.i restart server i log in and get lvl 3

Read full topic

item.title: Account Reset Problem
item.dc:creator: @Surfr Surfr
item.description:
@Surfr wrote:

Check it’s writing your character info to your character files before you log out, check your run.bat to see any errors, without this people can’t really help you.

Read full topic
